11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Al-Balj narrated from Muhammad bin Hatib Al-Jumahi who said that:The Messenger of Allah said: "The distinction between the lawful and the unlawful is the Duff and the voice

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِعْلاَنِ النِّكَاحِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Publicizing The Marriage
